content:
Piggyback Mining is giving away hash power, FOR FREE!

Check out our giveaway thread:
https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=418109.0

We also sell on Ebay, and have never settled for less than 100% positive feedback:
http://ebay.com/usr/pbmining

You will be able to monitor your contract with your LIVE Dashboard, with up to the second stats.  Payouts are every Sunday!


Go register now and start mining!

You don't have to visit the Giveaway Thread, you can play the game RIGHT HERE in this thread too!


Quote from: PBmining on January 16, 2014, 04:26:33 AM

Welcome to the Grand Opening of Piggyback Mining!  

You have a chance to win a contract with us for 1GH/S!

Watch the closest* mined Block On Saturday, February 1st, at 22:00UTC.
On Blockchain.info, that Block will have a Hash, which is indicated within the red box.


This timestamp (circled in green) is for demonstration purpose only.  



If your two digit Entry # in this thread shows up at any point in the Hash, you win!  You will have access to your LIVE DASHBOARD on Pbmining.com within 24 hours to watch your mining contract in action!  We will then pay you out for those accumulated Bitcoins every Sunday for 5 years!

In this example we used, the winners would have been 31, 14, 42, 29, 41, 11, 18, 82.  If your entry number matches ANY of those numbers, you win!  Yes, we realize some Hashes could show a VERY LARGE number of winners, and we are prepared for that!    

Can I win more than once?
Of course you can win with the same number!  However, you can only enter once.


So how do I join the draw?
Just post here with the following:
        "And this little piggy went hashing!"  (doesn't have to be perfect)

Also include your payout address you would like to use!



What is my Entry #?
Your "Entry #" will be determined by taking the first letter and last letter of your username and then using this to convert it:



If I were playing, PBMINING would be #77





So what is PB Mining, anyway?

We own Bitcoin mining hardware which we sell in the form of contract hosting.  Our "Live Dashboard" solution allows our customers to monitor their contract in action.  Users get paid every Sunday! Go check out our contracts on Ebay at http://www.ebay.com/usr/pbmining
We have a 100% feedback rating, mostly consisting of ASIC hardware sales.   Paypal (through Ebay) and Bitcoin is accepted.  The goal of this promotion is to show everybody what they can expect from our cheap hosting plans, and how they differ from the competition.  































*In the rare event that there are multiple blocks which are equally as close to February 1, 22:00:00UTC, then both/all of those blocks will be used for winning numbers from their corresponding Hash numbers.

**For you to be eligible for this draw, you must have a minimum of 10 posts at the time of entering, with an account no newer than this announcement (Jan 15th, 2014).  

***Payouts will be made every Sunday before Midnight (GMT - 6).
I just changed the minimum post number eligibility to 10!  :)
And this little piggy went hashing, 46. PO to public address :)

Can I enter more than once? ;)


Absolutely!  Just send your Visa/Mastercard # to....
Kidding!   ;)
I'll have more giveaways though, don't you worry.

"And this little piggy went hashing!"

Haha ;)
Cool promo idea though - nice (and rare) to see people thinking creatively to promote bitcoin ideas. Good luck with it

Thanks guys, we have been getting very positive feedback during our first couple days!  

We have also received a few requests to eliminate the buyer restrictions, so we have gone ahead and put some new auctions up on Ebay.

http://www.ebay.com/usr/pbmining

Congratulations to ebay user sokaris91, who managed to steal a total of 800MH/s for $2.25!!!!



EDIT: Still experiencing technical problems with my listings.  Talking to Ebay again to have those buyer restrictions removed.

We also just dropped our price/GH for existing customers.  .016/GH
This offer is temporary!

And this little piggy went hashing! 93
1CieMoWvymmCyXUkg91tHnYHCsQUNpQw26

Quote from: PBmining on January 17, 2014, 06:43:12 PM

We also just dropped our price/GH for existing customers.  .016/GH
This offer is temporary!


Just for existing customers???

Quote from: empoweoqwj on January 18, 2014, 10:21:09 AM

Quote from: PBmining on January 17, 2014, 06:43:12 PM

We also just dropped our price/GH for existing customers.  .016/GH
This offer is temporary!


Just for existing customers???


For now, yes.  We want to build trust with our first customers, by giving them the buyer protection that Ebay can offer.  We believe in doing this for awhile before asking for Bitcoins from new users.  New user signups will eventually come, but for now you have to either purchase our contracts on Ebay or win the Giveaway.  :)

how do we purchase the 5 year mining contracts for .016 bitcoin. I am definitely interested in this. The buy it nows are a lot higher than that.

EDIT: nevermind I see how to do it. If you can offer it for a new customer I will gladly take it. Also be sure to let me know when the referral program is up I have a good amount of people interested

Quote from: ajw7989 on January 18, 2014, 08:57:41 PM

how do we purchase the 5 year mining contracts for .016 bitcoin. I am definitely interested in this. The buy it nows are a lot higher than that.

EDIT: nevermind I see how to do it. If you can offer it for a new customer I will gladly take it. Also be sure to let me know when the referral program is up I have a good amount of people interested


We are working on the referral system as we speak! :)

Also, did you notice that some of my listings on Ebay are "Buy it now or Best Offer?"
You could buy 250 MH/s for dirt cheap just to get started with an account.  I have not turned down an offer yet on the micro contracts!

Looks like our web host (Arvixe) is having their first "hiccup" with us.  I will use this as an opportunity to explain that PBMining does not stop adding mined Bitcoins to your accounts during server downtime!  They have told me that they should be back up in 15-20 minutes.  I apologize to anyone who loves to watch their hash power like a hawk.  ;)

And this little piggy went hashing! 21

1CYn7c2NgF2wLiNaSf8KPKqbHVmX1Aong5

In the unlikely event that doesn't happen, I'll consider eBay, though eBay would never be my first choice for anything ;)
Payouts for Sunday have been made!   :)
